vbaItem.vbaCode:
Private Sub AbaAlmHistorico_Click()
On Error GoTo ErrHandler
Dim INSTRUMENTO As String
INSTRUMENTO = Text1.Caption PONTEIRO_1 = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 4, 1) PONTEIRO_2 = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 12, 1)
If PONTEIRO_1 = "-" Then INSTR_TIPO = Left(INSTRUMENTO, 1) If PONTEIRO_2 <> "-" Then INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 5, 8) Else INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 5, 7) + "_" + Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 13, 3) End If Else INSTR_TIPO = Left(INSTRUMENTO, 2) INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 6, 8) End If
If INSTR_TIPO = "L" Then ' AlarmEventSummary1.FilterDefinition = " EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_TIPO & "' And EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_NUMERO & "' And (EventSource LIKE 'H_' Or EventSource LIKE 'L_')" FactoryTalkAlarmandEventLogViewer1.WhereClause = " SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_TIPO & "%' And SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_NUMERO & "%' And (SourceName LIKE '%LA%H_%' Or SourceName LIKE '%LA%L_%')" Else ' AlarmEventSummary1.FilterDefinition = " EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_TIPO & "' And EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_NUMERO & "'" FactoryTalkAlarmandEventLogViewer1.WhereClause = " SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_TIPO & "%' And SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_NUMERO & "%'" End If
Exit Sub ErrHandler:
End Sub
Private Sub Display_AnimationStart()
On Error GoTo ErrHandler
Dim INSTRUMENTO As String
INSTRUMENTO = Text1.Caption PONTEIRO_1 = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 4, 1) PONTEIRO_2 = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 12, 1)
If PONTEIRO_1 = "-" Then INSTR_TIPO = Left(INSTRUMENTO, 1) If PONTEIRO_2 <> "-" Then INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 5, 8) Else INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 5, 7) + "_" + Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 13, 3) End If Else INSTR_TIPO = Left(INSTRUMENTO, 2) INSTR_NUMERO = Mid(INSTRUMENTO, 6, 8) End If
If INSTR_TIPO = "L" Then AlarmEventSummary1.FilterDefinition = " EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_TIPO & "' And EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_NUMERO & "' And (EventSource LIKE 'H_' Or EventSource LIKE 'L_')" ' FactoryTalkAlarmandEventLogViewer1.WhereClause = " SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_TIPO & "%' And SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_NUMERO & "%' And (SourceName LIKE '%LA%H_%' Or SourceName LIKE '%LA%L_%')" Else AlarmEventSummary1.FilterDefinition = " EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_TIPO & "' And EventSource LIKE '" & INSTR_NUMERO & "'" ' FactoryTalkAlarmandEventLogViewer1.WhereClause = " SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_TIPO & "%' And SourceName LIKE '%" & INSTR_NUMERO & "%'" End If
Exit Sub ErrHandler:
End Sub
